span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 把…当作神来崇拜,尊崇： to offer honor or respect to (someone) as a divine power
【例】 some ancient pagans deified such objects of nature as trees and rivers 很多古代的异教徒拿一些自然事物比如树木，河流来崇拜
【近】 glorify, revere, venerate
【近】 aggrandize, canonize, dignify, ennoble, glorify, magnify
【反】 abase, degrade, demean, humble, humiliate 贬低，羞辱
【反】 debasement 贬低
【考法 2】 v. 过分喜爱： to love or admire too much
【例】 materialistic people who deify money 那些眼里只有钱的物质之人
【近】 adore, adulate, canonize, dote
